riven-tracking-arg-desc: (Tracking Only) The page uses the {{#arg}} function.
riven-tracking-explodeargs-desc: The page uses the old {{#explodeargs}} function; it should be converted to use {{#splitargs}}.
riven-tracking-pickfrom-desc: (Tracking Only) The page uses the {{#pickfrom}} function.
riven-tracking-rand-desc: (Tracking Only) The page uses the {{#rand}} function.
riven-tracking-skinname-desc: (Tracking Only) The page uses the {{SKINNAME}} variable.
